#id=1
#text=As I was preparing breakfast , I noticed that I was out of a lot of things that are staples in the preparation of most other dishes .
#id=2
#text=Bread , milk , and things of that nature .
#id=3
#text=So after I was done with breakfast , I sat down to prepare a grocery shopping list .
#id=4
#text=I thought of all the things off the top of my head that I would need , and then I perused through my cupboards and refrigerator to fill in the blanks .
#id=5
#text=Once I was satisfied with my list , I got dressed and got in my car .
#id=6
#text=I drove to the grocery store and parked .
#id=7
#text=I grabbed a cart and pulled my shopping list out of my purse .
#id=8
#text=I went up and down the aisles , placing things in the cart as I went .
#id=9
#text=Once I had everything , I went to the checkout counter .
#text=I put all my things on the belt and a bagger bagged them as the cashier scanned .
#text=The bagger set the bags in my cart , and I took the bags out to my car .
#text=Once I got home , I brought the bags inside and put all the groceries away .
#text=This is how I went grocery shopping .
